page.title: 14WILDLIFE AROUND MADDERTY
page.content: We have lots of Wildlife in Madderty. We often see rabbits and hares.There are grey and red squirrels in the woods. There are not so many red squirrels now because the grey squirrels are killing them.We see quite alot of hedgehogs,many killed on the roads.In gardens and grassy fields, moles,voles and shrews can be seen.We have Roe Deers which we mostly see near the woods.Stoats and weasels are seen crossing the road.Mice usually come into peoples houses.Round the farmyards rats are seen.At night you can sometimes see bats flying about the eaves of houses or barns.We ocassionally see one or two foxes. A girl in our school found a polecat on the road once but we have not seen any more.
